text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 71.1. Yaqeenan hum ney Nooh(alh e salam)ko inki qom ki taraf bheja kay apni qom ko darado (aur khabaerdar kerdo) isss say pehlay kay inkay pass dardnak azab ajaye 71.2. (Nooh alh e salam ney)kaha aey meri qom mein tumhein saaf saaf daranay wala hun 71.3. Kay tum Allah ki ibadat kero aur issi say daro aur mera kaha maano 71.4. To wo tumhary gunha bukhsh day ga aur tumhein aik waqat mukarrera tak chor dega YaqeenanAllah ka wada jab aajata hay to moakhir nahi hota kaash kay tumhien samjh hoti
